forms module¶

class forms.CommentForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm

Inherits from FlaskForm object. Defines the data to be received when a user makes a ForumPost (response to a forum thread).

comment = <UnboundField(StringField, (), {'widget': <wtforms.widgets.core.TextArea object>, 'validators': [<wtforms.validators.DataRequired object>]})>¶
submit = <UnboundField(SubmitField, ('Add Comment',), {})>¶

class forms.LoginForm(formdata=<object object>, **kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_wtf.form.FlaskForm

This class inherits from the FlaskForm class in Flask. This defines the fields to be received in a Login POST request from the Account page.
